member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Configuration.BlueDBClientProperties.Init``1
member.summary: Initializes BlueDBClient. The entity namespace and assembly is extracted from the specified example entity type.
member.typeparam: One of the entity types from which to extract the entity namespace and assembly from.

member.summary: Initializes BlueDBClient. The entity namespace and assembly is extracted from the specified example entity type.
member.param: One of the entity types from which to extract the entity namespace and assembly from.

member.name: F:BlueDBClient.NET.Configuration.BlueDBClientProperties.EntityNamespace
member.summary: The namespace of the entities.

member.name: F:BlueDBClient.NET.Configuration.BlueDBClientProperties.EntityAssemblyName
member.summary: The name of the assembly in which the entities are located.

member.name: T:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity
member.summary: Base class for BlueDB entities.

member.name: P:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity.IsPersistent
member.summary: Determines whether this entity is present in the database or not. Basically, it returns true if ID>0.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the provided entity is equal to the current entity. True when they are the same type and have the same ID.
member.param: The entity to compare with the current entity.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity.GetHashCode
member.summary: Gets the ID of the entity.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current entity.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity.op_Equality(BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity,BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity)
member.summary: Determines whether both entities are considered equal. True when they are the same type and have the same ID.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity.op_Inequality(BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity,BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity)
member.summary: Determines whether both entities are not considered equal. True when they are not the same type or have a different ID.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity.GetAllFields``1(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a list of all fields of the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type of which to get the fields.
member.param: Determines whether to include fields of parent classes of the specified type.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity.GetAllFields(System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a list of all fields of the specified type.
member.param: The type of which to get the fields.
Determines whether to include fields of parent classes of the specified type.

member.name: T:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.Fields.Field
member.summary: Represents a field of a database entity. Use Register method to register a field inside an entity.

member.name: P:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.Fields.Field.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the field.

member.name: P:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.Fields.Field.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of the field.

member.name: P:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.Fields.Field.TypeOfEntity
member.summary: Gets the type of the entity field, if it represents an entity. If it is a list of entities, returns the type of entity.

member.name: P:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.Fields.Field.EntityType
member.summary: Gets the type of the entity.

member.name: P:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.Fields.Field.DataType
member.summary: Gets the field data type (property, entity, list).

member.name: P:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.Fields.Field.IsEntity
member.summary: Returns true if this field represents an entity or a list of entities.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.Fields.Field.Register(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Registers a new field to the specified entity type.

member.name: T:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.ObservableBlueDBEntity
member.summary:
A base class for entities that must implement INotifyPropertyChanged interface.
Use RaisePropertyChanged and Set methods.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.ObservableBlueDBEntity.RaisePropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Raises the PropertyChanged event. You do not need to call this manually if you use the Set method.
member.param: The name of the property that changed.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.ObservableBlueDBEntity.RaisePropertyChanging(System.String)
member.summary: Raises the PropertyChanging event. You do not need to call this manually if you use the Set method.
member.param: The name of the property that is about to be changed.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.ObservableBlueDBEntity.Set``1(System.String,``0@,``0)
member.summary: Compares the current and new value of the specified field. If it differs, then it raises PropertyChanging event, assigns the new value and raises the PropertyChanged event.
member.typeparam: The type of the property that is being set.
member.param: The name of the property that is being set.
The field that is being set.
The new field value that is about to be set.

member.summary: Determines whether this instance can convert the specified object type.

member.summary: Reads the JSON representation of the object.

member.summary: Writes the JSON representation of the object.

member.summary: If it doesn't return null, that means that an entity of the same type with the same key was already decoded and was found in the session and returned.

member.name: T:BlueDBClient.NET.IO.JSON
member.summary: Includes utility functions for encoding/decoding entities to/from Json.

member.summary: Encodes a list of entities to a JSON string.

member.summary: Encodes provided entity to a JSON string.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Utility.EntityUtility.AreEqual(BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity,BlueDBClient.NET.Entity.BlueDBEntity)
member.summary: Determines whether both entities are equal. They must be of the same type. This function searches in depth to the end, so it can be slow.

member.name: M:BlueDBClient.NET.Utility.ReflectionUtility.GetPropertyType(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary:
Gets the type of the specified property in the specified type.
If the type is nullable, this function gets its generic definition.
member.param: The type that has the specified property.

member.summary: Gets the property information by name for the type of the provided object.

member.summary: Gets the property information by name for the specified type.
